name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Priil Guard - Block Malicious URL & IP

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features of Priil Guard

- Enhanced Security: Browse safely online when you reduce malicious websites and ip address containing malware and scams from compromising your device, providing peace of mind while exploring the web.

- Friendly Support: Get fast and reliable support from the dedicated Priil Technical Support.

About Us

Guarding your digital world, one click at a time.
Cybercrime happens every second and Priil’s team of skilled experts is committed to protecting your devices—whether Mac, Android, iOS, or Windows. We ensure your devices run smoothly, perform at their best, and enhance your productivity without interruptions from hackers and cybercriminals. 

Our Mission

To create a safe environment for all your devices, free from viruses, ransomware, and cyber attacks. 

Our Vision

Deliver proactive protection & secure our customers' data from evolving threats & zero-day vulnerabilities.

Our Objective

To translate our innovation into action, enhancing your safety with our expertise around the clock
